name: META (Legitt)
description:
You just woke up. You're alone. Hints are scattered through your journey.

But you can't solve the puzzle.

At least not within the game.

META is an ARG-inspired game where the puzzles are solved through literal outside-the-box thinking. Solve equations, scan QR codes, and analyze the soundtrack itself in order to find passwords and keep moving forward.

Hope you can reach the end.... If there is one
